1493140.name: RPG Maker MZ - KR Elemental Dungeon Tileset - Celestial Flora Ice Time
1493140.description:
Bring the power of the elements to your RPG Maker game with KR Elemental Dungeon Tiles, featuring celestial, flora, ice and time elements!

Need a place to hide your magical world-saving crystals? A lair for your villains or mystical creatures? Or just looking for something a little different? This set of four elements has a wide variety of tiles, including extra-large statues and unique pieces.

Includes:

* 1 A1 sheet with water, lava, and poison
* 4 A2 sheets (one for each element) which includes multiple ground types, cracks, crystal autotiles and more (depending on element)
* 15 A4 walls
* B-E Sheets with hand-drawn pillars, massive dragon head statues, torches and crystals, magic rings, bridges, doors, windows, thrones for your villain, and more!

** Please note there is some content in this pack that is similar or identical to KR Elemental Dungeon Tileset - Fire Water Earth Wind:

Tile A4 - Concrete wall, black stone wall are the same.
Tile B - four pillars or torch bases are the same. The snakes have slightly different colored eyes.
Tile C - Ornate platforms + stairs at upper left are the same.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1493140.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
